29 #define DEBUG 0
30 
32 #define CAMERA_RES 64
33 
34 #include <ros/ros.h>
35 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
36 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
37 #include <sensor_msgs/image_encodings.h>
38 
39 #include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
40 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
41 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
42 
43 int main(int argc, char *argv[]){
44  // ROS Node init
45  ros::init(argc, argv, "raw_pub_node");
46 
47  // Instantiate node handle
48  ros::NodeHandle n;
49 
50  // Set up image transport publisher
51  image_transport::ImageTransport it(n);
52  image_transport::Publisher pub = it.advertise("frames", 1);
53 
54  // Start OpenCV video capture
55  cv::VideoCapture cap;
56  if(!cap.open(0)) {
57  ROS_ERROR("OpenCV capture failed to open.");
58  return -1;
59  }
60 
61 
62  // Comment these lines to capture at full resolution
63  // (probably only worth it for testing).
64  cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH, CAMERA_RES);
65  cap.set(cv::CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT, CAMERA_RES);
66 
67 
68  // Capture convert and publish images
69  ROS_INFO("Publishing...");
70  while(ros::ok()){
71 
72  // Get OpenCV frame
73  cv::Mat frame;
74 
75  cap >> frame;
76  if (frame.empty()){
77  ROS_INFO("Camera frame empty, exiting.");
78  return 0;
79  }
80 
81  #if DEBUG
82  // If we're in debug mode allow the node to create a
83  // video window.
84  cv::imshow("Publisher - Video", frame);
85  if (cv::waitKey(10) == 27) break;
86  #endif
87 
88  // Convert to sensor_msgs/Image
89  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr img_msg =
90  cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "bgr8", frame).toImageMsg();
91 
92  // Publish our camera image - want to publish them as frequently as we can.
93  pub.publish(img_msg);
94  }
95 
96  return 0;
97 }
